dmca.title: Shopping-Bargains didn't bargain for site copying
dmca.body:
Dear Google:

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the entire site at http://www.shopping-bargains.com.

2.	The material that infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above is found at http://www.great-store.net. It appears that an attempt was made to copy the entire site from #1 above and then change the name and logo.

3.	My contact information is as follows: [private]@shopping-bargains.com [private] (office)

Shopping-Bargains.com, LLC [private] Starkville, MS 39759

4.	The whois information provided for Great-Store.net is invalid. I have contacted the ISP and the registrar of record for this domain name and they may act to remove it. The registrar of record reported back to me that they have been unable to contact the owner of this domain.

This is the whois information that I have:

[private] [private]@yahoo.com [private]

[private] Tucson, 85719

5.	"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

6.	"I affirm, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."
 
7. Sign the paper. 
[signature]
[private]
President Shopping-Bargains.com, LLC

8. Fax to: (650) 963-3255, Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
